attachmentHtml:
PC Number: 2006-0014

Date: 2006-01-19

Her Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Minister of Transport, pursuant to subsection 14(1) of the Arctic Waters Pollution Prevention Act, hereby

 

(a) designates the person listed in column 1 of Schedule A to this Order as a pollution prevention officer, with the powers vested in them as set out in column 2 of that schedule; and

 

(b) terminates the appointments of the persons listed in Schedule B to this Order.


Sur recommandation du ministre des Transports et en vertu du paragraphe 14(1) de la Loi sur la prévention de la pollution des eaux arctiques, Son Excellence la Gouverneure générale en conseil :

 

a) désigne la personne dont le nom figure à la colonne 1 de l’annexe A ci‑jointe à titre de fonctionnaire chargé de la prévention de la pollution et lui confère les pouvoirs énoncés à la colonne 2;

 

b) met fin à la nomination des personnes dont le nom figure à l’annexe B ci‑jointe.


                                                                  SCHEDULE A

 

                                                          Arctic Waters Pollution Prevention Act

 

                                                                                     DESIGNATIONS

 

COLUMN 1                                                                                                                   COLUMN 2

 

NAME                                                                                                                            POWERS VESTED

 

MAUNG, James                                                                                                          par. 15(4)(a) to (c); s. 23


                                                                   SCHEDULE B

 

                                                          Arctic Waters Pollution Prevention Act

 

                                                                     DESIGNATIONS TERMINATED

 

NAME                                                                               POWERS VESTED                                          ORDER IN COUNCIL

 

BAMBURY, Roy Lewis                                                    par. 15(4)(a) to (c); s. 23                         P.C. 1991‑1275

CLASSEN, Eric Orval                                                    par. 15(4)(a) to (c); s. 23                         P.C. 1991‑1275

ELDIB, Nabil                                                                    par. 15(4)(a) to (c); s. 23                         P.C. 1991‑1275

MCLEOD, Donald H.                                                     par. 15(4)(a) to (c); s. 23                         P.C. 1991‑1275

PICCO, George                                                             par. 15(4)(a) to (c); s. 23                         P.C. 1991‑1275

ROSE, George Roy                                                        par. 15(4)(a) to (c); s. 23                         P.C. 1991‑1275

WONG, Pierre                                                                par. 15(4)(a) to (c); s. 23                         P.C. 2005‑1577


                                                                    ANNEXE A

 

                                        Loi sur la prévention de la pollution des eaux arctiques

 

                                                                                     DÉSIGNATIONS

 

COLONNE 1                                                                                                                 COLONNE 2

 

NOM                                                                                                                              POUVOIRS CONFÉRÉS

 

MAUNG, James                                                                                                          al. 15(4)a) à c); art. 23


                                                                     ANNEXE B

 

                                        Loi sur la prévention de la pollution des eaux arctiques

 

                                                                            FIN DES DÉSIGNATIONS
